name: W.O.M.A.N., Inc.
description: Crisis support, counseling, legal advocacy, and Spanish-language services
fullDescription: W.O.M.A.N., Inc. has served the San Francisco Bay Area since 1978, providing crisis intervention, counseling, advocacy, and support services for individuals experiencing unsafe home situations.
whatTheyOffer:
- 24-hour crisis line
- Individual counseling sessions
- Support groups
- Legal advocacy
- Safety planning
- Latinx program with Spanish-speaking staff
- Community education
- Referrals to resources
howToGetIt:
1. Call crisis line: 415-864-4722
2. For Latinx program: 415-969-6811
3. Email for appointments
4. Walk-in hours available
5. All services confidential
6. No insurance required
